channel.title: Winning Robo Fighto
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Winning Robo Fighto" - How do people win Robo Fighto Tournaments?

item.title: Re: Winning Robo Fighto
item.content:encoded:
You only win when you don't truly care about winning and aren't angry about losing… like golf.

Zen and the Art of Robo Fighto

item.title: Re: Winning Robo Fighto
item.content:encoded: You only win when you don't truly care about winning and aren't angry about losing… like golf.

item.title: Re: Winning Robo Fighto
item.content:encoded:
The secret to winning in Robo is be…

Completely and utterly insane with your pushes!

And I hate Robo. -__-

item.title: Re: Winning Robo Fighto
item.content:encoded: Sorry, it's all about luck. You can obtain the Mister Roboto bloodline from winning a tournament(not just a part, but coming in 1st). That gives you one guaranteed push per day, but it's still all luck getting to the point where it will be useful.

item.title: Winning Robo Fighto
item.content:encoded:
How the hell do people win the tournaments in Robo Fighto? I've seen some very high scores but can't seem to emulate them through pushing. Is there another way to obtain the high scores needed to win tourneys or is it all about the luck?
Please, somebody tell me how to play and win!
